[bq="Zak_Inc"]Anyone here watch Doctor Who?

And if yes, anyone wanna talk about how utterly disappointing the finale of season 8 was?[/bq]
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548c9b1d6368724792f10000#post_548c9b1d6368724792f10000
[bq="ParagonCommander"]"@Zak_Inc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548c9ad56368724811430000#post_548c9ad56368724811430000
_*THIS*_ is something we can completely agree on! Holy shit that finale was *_BAAAAAAAAD_*[/bq]
Oh for fuck's sakes.  I like Doctor Who, but all I ever hear from other fans is everyone constantly going "well <x> episode is horrible" "well <y> episode is horrible" "well <z> episode is horrible"
Hell I've seen people say episodes Blink, pandorica opens, the big bang and such "bad".

It's totally okay if people dislike episodes, but *ALL* I ever hear from "fans" is how "horrible" the show is.

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548c9c246368724811690000#post_548c9c246368724811690000
Oh, was it confirmed he/she isn't dead?

But anyway, yeah, them killing of Danny was dumb, the whole tardis key lava scene was _dumb_, the master/mistress' whole plan was *_dumb_* and that sums it up really.

Season 8 has been really mixed for me. Other than the finale and a few select episodes (Listen, Kill The Moon and In the Forest Of the Night) the episodes were pretty darned good, and i'll be damned if Time Heist and Mummy on the Orient express aren't some of the best episodes ever.

But that finale though. I was expecting so much more from season 8 after season 7's A-FUCKING-MAZING final episode that explained all of the shit that had been going on since season 5.

I'm not too sure what i expect from season 9 at this point.

Holy hell, who in their right mind would call those bad?

Confusing? Very. Bad? nonononononoNO.[/bq]
There's a point of fanaticism towards franchises in which anything that isn't perfect is "trash" to the people and they spend all their time in the fandom constantly bashing anything that in their eyes isn't "perfect"; they're a type of neckbeard.

It's why I got in trouble for yelling "*SHUT THE LIVING FUCK UP!*" at the top of my lungs once cause a fan of a tv show found out that I liked it to and proceeded to go on a three hour rant about anything he hated.
